name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Area360 - Property Insights at a Glance - BETA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover smarter property insights with Area360 on Rightmove for FREE

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

Area360 is all-in-one 100% FREE tool for gaining deep insights into properties across the UK. Seamlessly integrated as a widget on Rightmove listings, and soon expanding to others, Area360 offers:

• 🏠 Property Insights: Price per square meter, EPC rating, floor area, and days on the market.
•📍Comprehensive Location Data: Full postcode, crime rate, deprivation level, income level, and social housing percentage.
• 🏫 🌳 🚆 Nearby Amenities: Closest tube/rail stations with lines, schools with ratings, and parks.
•⚡Quick Links: Access Google Maps, Census data, EPC certificates, and floor plans with one click.

Upgrade your property search experience with Area360 – making informed decisions has never been easier!

Keywords: rightmove, uk property, london property, property search, property analytics, house prices, property data, property insights, uk housing, property extension, rightmove extension, property tools
